languages.text: "Род Драйвстемов в минувшем цикле утроил подати, взимаемые с его дома. Ваша казна полнится золотом — губернатор изъявил надежду на то, что этот скромный дар станет символом вашего текущего и будущего преуспеяния в новой роли".

traits.locale_text: "Род Драйвстемов в минувшем цикле утроил подати, взимаемые с его дома. Ваша казна полнится золотом — губернатор изъявил надежду на то, что этот скромный дар станет символом вашего текущего и будущего преуспеяния в новой роли".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."
languages.original_text: "Род Драйвстемов в минувшем цикле утроил подати, взимаемые с его дома. Ваша казна полнится золотом — губернатор изъявил надежду на то, что этот скромный дар станет символом вашего текущего и будущего преуспеяния в новой роли".

traits.locale_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed his hopes that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your status."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Au cours du dernier cycle, la maison Drivestem a triplé les dîmes collectées auprès de ses sujets. Vos coffres débordent, et le gouverneur a exprimé l'espoir que ce modeste tribut devienne le symbole de vos réalisations, présentes et futures, dans votre nouveau rôle. »
languages.original_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."

traits.locale_text: « Au cours du dernier cycle, la maison Drivestem a triplé les dîmes collectées auprès de ses sujets. Vos coffres débordent, et le gouverneur a exprimé l'espoir que ce modeste tribut devienne le symbole de vos réalisations, présentes et futures, dans votre nouveau rôle. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “在过去的周期中，德莱夫斯塔家族从家族臣民身上征收的什一税翻了三倍，您的国库已经被彻底填满了。德莱夫斯塔总督希望这件卑微的礼物能助您马到成功，祝愿您在当前的位置上再创辉煌。”
languages.original_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."

traits.locale_text: “在过去的周期中，德莱夫斯塔家族从家族臣民身上征收的什一税翻了三倍，您的国库已经被彻底填满了。德莱夫斯塔总督希望这件卑微的礼物能助您马到成功，祝愿您在当前的位置上再创辉煌。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「過去の周期において、ドライブステム家は臣民から徴収する10分の1税を3倍に増やしました。陛下の財源は潤沢であり、このささやかな贈り物が、あなたの新たな地位における今後の成功の象徴となることを、総督は望んでおられます」
languages.original_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."

traits.locale_text: 「過去の周期において、ドライブステム家は臣民から徴収する10分の1税を3倍に増やしました。陛下の財源は潤沢であり、このささやかな贈り物が、あなたの新たな地位における今後の成功の象徴となることを、総督は望んでおられます」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Im letzten Zyklus verdreifachte Haus Drivestem den von ihren Untertanen erhobenen Zehnt. Eure Truhen sind randvoll und der Gouverneur äußerte die Hoffnung, dass dieses bescheidene Geschenk ein Symbol für Eure gegenwärtigen und zukünftigen Erfolge mit Eurem neuen Status werden kann."
languages.original_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."

traits.locale_text: "Im letzten Zyklus verdreifachte Haus Drivestem den von ihren Untertanen erhobenen Zehnt. Eure Truhen sind randvoll und der Gouverneur äußerte die Hoffnung, dass dieses bescheidene Geschenk ein Symbol für Eure gegenwärtigen und zukünftigen Erfolge mit Eurem neuen Status werden kann."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «El pasado ciclo, la casa Drivestem triplicó el diezmo recaudado a los súbditos de la dinastía. Vuestras arcas están rebosantes, y el gobernador ha manifestado su esperanza de que este modesto obsequio se convierta en un símbolo de su éxito actual y futuro en su nuevo cargo».
languages.original_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."

traits.locale_text: «El pasado ciclo, la casa Drivestem triplicó el diezmo recaudado a los súbditos de la dinastía. Vuestras arcas están rebosantes, y el gobernador ha manifestado su esperanza de que este modesto obsequio se convierta en un símbolo de su éxito actual y futuro en su nuevo cargo».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Geçmiş döngüde Drivestem Hanesi, tebaadan toplanan vergileri üç katına çıkardı. Mahzenleriniz dolup taşıyor. Vali; bu mütevazı armağanın, yeni statünüzdeki mevcut ve gelecekteki başarılarınızın bir sembolü olmasını dilediğini belirtti."
languages.original_text: "In the past cycle, House Drivestem tripled the tithes collected from the house's subjects. Your coffers are overflowing, and the governor has expressed hope that this modest gift will become a symbol of your present and future successes in your new status."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmiş döngüde Drivestem Hanesi, tebaalarından toplanan vergileri üç katına çıkardı. Mahzenleriniz dolup taşıyor ve vali, bu mütevazı armağanın, sahip olduğunuz yeni statüdeki mevcut ve gelecekteki başarılarınızın bir sembolü olmasını dilediğini belirtti."
traits.speaker: Clemence
